[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State enum] [State Machine Bypass] Can an attacker force state transitions by sending packets in unexpected order, bypassing DKG validation steps? Critical severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State enum] [Race Condition] Does the SignatureType parameter in NonceRequest/NonceGather/SigShareRequest/SigShareGather states prevent mixing of Frost/Schnorr/Taproot signatures in the same round? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State enum] [State Confusion] Can different coordinators disagree on state after processing the same packets if SignatureType values differ? Medium severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State::Idle] [Initialization] Is there validation that required config fields are set before transitioning from Idle to DkgPublicDistribute? Medium severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::BadDkgId] [ID Validation] Does error handling for BadDkgId prevent integer overflow attacks where attacker sends dkg_id near u64::MAX? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::BadSignId] [Replay Protection] Can an attacker replay old signing rounds if coordinator doesn't track maximum seen sign_id values? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::BadSignIterId] [Iteration Bypass] Can sign_iter_id be manipulated to skip malicious signer tracking between iterations? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::MaliciousSigner] [Incomplete Ban] Does marking a signer as malicious prevent them from participating in all future rounds of both DKG and signing? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::Aggregator] [Error Propagation] Can AggregatorError details leak private key information or internal state in error messages? Medium severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::SchnorrProofFailed] [Attack Surface] Does this error distinguish between malicious proofs vs. implementation bugs, potentially aiding attackers? Low severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::MissingAggregatePublicKey] [State Integrity] Can coordinator reach signing state without aggregate_public_key being set? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::DkgFailure] [Malicious Reporting] Can a malicious signer falsely report other honest signers as failing, causing DoS? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::AggregateKeyPolynomialMismatch] [Validation] Is this check performed before or after caching polynomials, preventing poisoning? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::DuplicatePartyId] [ID Uniqueness] Does this error catch duplicates during both DKG setup and after loading saved state? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Error::InvalidPacketSignature] [Bypass] Can packet signature verification be disabled at runtime after initial setup? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config::new()] [Threshold Validation] Does Config::new() validate that threshold <= num_keys to prevent impossible threshold requirements? Critical severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config::new()] [DKG Threshold] In Config::new(), dkg_threshold is set to num_keys by default - can this cause DKG to fail if any signer is unavailable? Medium severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config::new()] [Zero Values] Does Config::new() reject num_signers=0, num_keys=0, or threshold=0 which would break protocol invariants? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config::with_timeouts()] [Threshold Invariant] Does with_timeouts() validate dkg_threshold >= threshold as required for security? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config::message_private_key] [Key Security] Can message_private_key be zero or identity, weakening packet authentication? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config::public_keys] [Validation] Are public_keys validated for consistency (signer_key_ids matching key_ids) during construction? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config::verify_packet_sigs] [Default Insecure] Does verify_packet_sigs default to false in some paths, allowing unauthenticated packets? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config timeouts] [None Handling] If all timeout fields are None, can coordinator hang indefinitely waiting for malicious signers? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config::dkg_threshold] [Threshold Math] Can dkg_threshold > num_keys cause DKG to never complete? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Integer Overflow] Can num_keys * num_signers overflow u32 in downstream calculations? Medium severity.
